import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faAngleLeft, faEnvelope, faMobile, faUserCircle } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { Col, Row, Form, Card, Button, FormCheck, Container, InputGroup } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import { Link ,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; export default () => { const[product_form,formchange] = useState(""); const[Brand_name,Brand_namechange] = useState(""); const[intended_use,intendedchange] = useState(""); const[shelflife,shelflifechange] = useState(""); const[targetuser,targetuserchange] = useState(""); const[additive,additivechange] = useState(""); const[nutrition,nutritionchange] = useState(""); const[fooding,ingrechange] = useState(""); const[condition,conditionchange] = useState(""); const history = useHistory(); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("token")); function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); const ind_data ={product_form,Brand_name,intended_use,shelflife,targetuser,additive,nutrition,fooding,condition}; fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/apiaccounts/Apply/',{ method:"POST", headers:{ Authorization: `Bearer ${user.access_token}`, "content-type":"application/json"}, body:JSON.stringify(ind_data) }) .then(res=>{ alert('Applied successfully'); history.push('/industry/apply') }).catch((err) =>{ console.log(err.message) }) } return (

Application

Brand Name Brand_namechange(e.target.value)} /> Intended Use intendedchange(e.target.value)} /> Product Form formchange(e.target.value)}> Target User targetuserchange(e.target.value)} /> Shelf Life shelflifechange(e.target.value)} /> Storage Condition conditionchange(e.target.value)} /> Food Ingredient ingrechange(e.target.value)} /> Food Additives additivechange(e.target.value)} /> Nutritional Information phonechange(e.target.value)} /> I agree to the terms and conditions
); };
